scripts.prisma-generate: dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema node_modules/@trofos-nus/common/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema node_modules/@trofos-nus/common/prisma_pgvector/schema_ai.prisma
scripts.prisma-generate-dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema node_modules/@trofos-nus/common/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema node_modules/@trofos-nus/common/prisma_pgvector/schema_ai.prisma
scripts.start-dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm run build && dotenv -e .env.development.local -- nodemon
scripts.start-prod: dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm run build && dotenv -e .env.production.local -- node dist/index.js
